Uses of Class
geometry.planar.Line

  • Packages that use Line 
    Package Description
    board
    Contains classes describing items on a printed circuit board and the board itself.
    designformats.specctra
    Contains classes for reading and writing board designs in the Specctra dsn text format.
    geometry.planar
    Contains general purpose 2-dimensional geometry classes.

      Side Line.side_of_intersection(Line p_1, Line p_2)
      Returns Side.ON_THE_LEFT, if this line is on the left of the intersection of p_1 and p_2, Side.ON_THE_RIGHT, if this line is on the right of the intersection, and Side.COLLINEAR, if all 3 lines intersect in exacly 1 point.
      Side TileShape.side_of(Line p_line)
      Returns Side.COLLINEAR, if p_line intersects with the interiour of this shape, Side.ON_THE_LEFT, if this shape is completely on the left of p_line or Side.ON_THE_RIGHT, if this shape is completely on the right of p_line.
